titles: The Lords property in His redeemed people. Opened in a sermon at St. Pauls Church, London, Octob. 28. / By Edward Reynolds, D.D. and chaplain in ordinary to the Kings Majesty. Printed by the order of the Lord Mayor and court of aldermen.
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: printed by T.R. for George Thomason, at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,
notes: The first leaf bears an order to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
